title: Personal Portfolio
description: Responsive developer portfolio built using React, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Animal Part Tracking Utility
purpose: Visualize and correct animal tracking data
description: Full-stack tracking platform for Branson Lab to visualize, audit, and correct animal trajectories with canvas-based tools, undo/redo, and TRK/HDF5 export.

title: Vendor & Client Management Dashboard
description: Admin and vendor dashboards with full CRUD, enquiry workflows, approvals, and role-based resource management.

title: Zoom & Monday.com Integration
description: Automated syncing of Zoom meeting data to Monday.com with AI-generated summaries, action items, and structured board updates.

title: Timerely â€“ Timesheet Management System
description: Enterprise timesheet platform with time logging, approvals, task assignment, team management, and weekly reporting.

title: AppRely HR Portal
description: HR management portal with job posting, applicant lifecycle tracking, role-based actions, and responsive dashboards.

title: Weather Forecast Application
description: Weather app with geolocation, detailed forecasts, dynamic visuals, and recent search history using OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Traffic Forecasting using LSTM
description: Time-series traffic forecasting system using LSTM with preprocessing pipelines, model evaluation, and multi-step predictions.
